==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|きょ|みん|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=きょみん}} compound {{m|ltc|居民|tr=*giu *min}}. Compare modern {{cog|zh|居民|tr=jūmín}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|On'yomi}}
* {{ja-accent-common|h|きょ|みん}}<ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[kjo̞mĩɴ]}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|きょみん}}

# [[resident]], [[inhabitant]] (of a particular area)
